workItems.title: ReacType
workItems.blurb: Prototyping tool that allows users to quickly mock-up layouts and export them as code templates in Typescript. My role involved rebuilding the GUI as a drag-and-drop canvas, extending export options to include Nextjs, and implementing unit tests

workItems.title: Identity Shifters
workItems.blurb: Built long-scrolling, fully-responsive microsite to showcase agency research and insights on demographic profile of Generation Z

workItems.title: ampm
workItems.blurb: Served as front-end lead for ampm.com redesign and developed fully-responsive layouts with customizable color themes. Worked closely with creatives and back-end engineers to integrate and launch

workItems.title: Arco MX
workItems.blurb: Front-end development of regional Arco Mexico site, as well as regular and promotional site updates for Arco national website.
